body_html:
Since I haven't found any example codes or explanations for contrib.legacy_seq2seq and contrib.seq2seq API after 1.1 release, I made my own sample codes.
https://github.com/j-min/tf_tutorial_plus/tree/master/RNN_seq2seq
Is there a way that I can contribute by refactoring my code as part of official tutorials seq2seq APIs?

body:
Since I haven't found any example codes or explanations for `contrib.legacy_seq2seq` and `contrib.seq2seq` API after 1.1 release, I made my own sample codes.
